about_the_game:
Maid Love is an adult content pack for the Maid Cafe game that extends many of the primary endings of the game as well as the secret romances of the game, adding new epilogues to the game that extend these stories to see what happens next.

By purchasing and installing the pack you can see new epilogues for the following characters...
  • Lilly
  • Lucy
  • Emma
  • Abigail
  • Shelby
  • Gemma
  • Isla
  • Izumi
  • Roxxie
  • Josie
  • Suzi & Suki
  • Erin
  • Michelle

This pack extends the intimate content of all of these characters with new illustrations and adult scenes.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product depicts various sexual acts and sequences between a man and a woman, in the form of additional content that extends the various endings of the game

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
